ticket.title: Documentation correction
ticket.original-body:
Greetings,
In this URL: http://api.rubyonrails.org/classes/ActiveRecord/Base.html#method-c-set_table_name
The documentation for table_name is missing ... something... See vvvv => a few lines down
class Invoice < ActiveRecord::Base; end; file class table_name invoice.rb Invoice invoices
vvvv => Here it IS ... there are 2 end; end at the line, but no extra class or module
class Invoice < ActiveRecord::Base; class Lineitem < ActiveRecord::Base; end; end; file class table_name invoice.rb Invoice::Lineitem invoice_lineitems
Regards,
Daniel

ticket.original-body-html:
Greetings,

In this URL: http://api.rubyonrails.org/classes/ActiveRecord/Base.html#method-c-...

The documentation for table_name is missing ... something... See vvvv => a few lines down

class Invoice < ActiveRecord::Base; end;
file class table_name
invoice.rb Invoice invoices

vvvv => Here it IS ... there are 2 end; end at the line, but no extra class or module

class Invoice < ActiveRecord::Base; class Lineitem < ActiveRecord::Base; end; end;
file class table_name
invoice.rb Invoice::Lineitem invoice_lineitems

Regards,

Daniel
